alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:15PM CDT until June 12 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR COMANCHE COUNTY... At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Comanche, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Comanche, De Leon, Proctor Lake, Comyn, Proctor, Hasse, Sidney, Duster, Downing, Rucker, Van Dyke, Beattie and Sipe Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.
